basics.label: Finance Controller
basics.summary: Established goals and objectives, developed policies and procedures, recruited and trained staff, initiated and enhanced automated systems. Turned around 'problem areas'. Ensures compliance with and knowledge of governmental regulations and requirements. Defined and closely monitored short-and long-term goals and objectives for all departments.

work.name: Company Name
work.summary: Managed team 100 professionals... Managed and tracked the revenue of invested assets to ensure compliance with company policies and investment guidelines.
